div.p: The usage and impact of different GWP 100 CO 2e conversion factors, showing (a) the different conversion factors used (by which IPCC Assessment Report, AR, they were from), (b) the overall impact of harmonising to AR5 GWP 100 conversion factors, and (c) the difference in the paper's own and AR5 harmonised CH 4 and N 2O emissions reported as GWP 100 CO 2e.
